values: 面粉（尤指小麦粉）；谷物粉
撒面粉；给…上粉（尤指在烹饪前给肉类或鱼类裹上一层面粉）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 兴旺；茂盛；挥舞；炫耀；华饰
繁荣，兴旺；茂盛；活跃；处于旺盛时期

word_group.brief_definition: 中筋面粉, (不含发酵粉的) 普通面粉
中筋面粉；不含发酵粉的面粉
高筋面粉；强力面粉；筋面

bilingual.source: Mix the butter and sugar together and then boil the flour and eggs.
bilingual.target: 把黄油和糖混合在一起，然后煮面粉和鸡蛋。

bilingual.source: The recipe calls for graham flour instead of regular flour.
bilingual.target: 这个食谱要求使用全麦面粉而不是普通面粉。

bilingual.source: Bread flour has more protein than regular flour.
bilingual.target: 面包粉比普通面粉含有更多的蛋白质。

bilingual.source: This bag of flour is five pounds.
She used a sieve to sift the flour.

bilingual.target: 他们磨玉米来制作面粉。

bilingual.source: She used a scoop to measure the flour.
We have used up all the flour.
bilingual.target: 我们已经用光了所有的面粉。

list.abstract: flour（英[ˈflaʊə]，美[ˈflaʊər]），英语单词。可做名词或动词用。做名词时，指谷物粉、面粉、淀粉质植物籽磨成的粉；做动词时，指撒粉于、把…磨成粉。英语短语有barley flour（大麦面粉），例句为I wanted to make dumplings but found I had run out of flour, so I went out to buy some.（我想包饺子，但发现面粉用完了，所以我出去买了一些。） 第三人称单数为flours；现在分词为flouring；过去式为floured；过去分词为floured。 近义词为wheat meal。

yingyinNormal.en: And I've also got wholemeal flour as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也准备了全麦的面粉。

yingyinNormal.en: First, I put some flour in the bowl. Ooooo!
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我把一些面粉放进碗里。噢！！！

yingyinNormal.en: A single grain of wheat will make 20,000 flour particles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一石磨小麦能磨出2万斤面粉。

yingyinNormal.en: To start with, I have my beautiful warm wheat flour which I've never used warm flour before, straight from the mill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我先处理还温热的面粉我之前还没用过直接从磨坊里拿来的温的面粉。

yingyinNormal.en: Now uses several different flours. White flour, the rye flour that we got from the mill, which is a fantastic rye flour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用到几种不同的面粉，白面，黑麦面，我们从磨坊拿来的黑麦面，很美味。

yingyinNormal.en: My final tip is to finish by spraying the raw loaf with water and dusting with flour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后一步是在面团上撒些水和面粉。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm combining 150 grams of white flour with 350 grams of Justin's rye flour, which will give the loaf a nutty taste.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要用150克的白面，加上300克贾斯汀的黑麦面粉，吃起来会更硬一点。

yingyinNormal.en: Bit of flour on the bench. Get your dough out, shape it into a rough rectangle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在面板上撒一些面粉，取出面团，做成长方形。

yingyinNormal.en: Coat it in a little bit of flour and spin it. Pop that on to a tray. Goes right in the middle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 撒上点面粉，转一下放在托盘的中间。

yingyinNormal.en: So there's the first bit of the flour coming down. What a lovely color. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是刚出来的第一批面粉，看看颜色，多漂亮是的。

yingyinNormal.en: And now I'm gonna start using my hands, so at this stage, I've nearly incorporated all of the flour into one big lump.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我就要用手了现在我快要把面粉揉成一团了。

yingyinNormal.en: Unbleached, nothing unnatural in it. Just the pure wholemeal flour. A beautiful thing. It's lovely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有漂白，全天然的，真正的全麦面粉，多好的东西，很棒。

yingyinNormal.en: It is therefore a good idea to use a little bit of extra flour to stop the dough sticking to the work surface.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用一点面粉来防止面团粘在面板上，确实是一个好主意。

yingyinNormal.en: Now I'm gonna dig this out, put it in a little bit of flour, flatten it down with your hand, fold it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来就是把面团取出来，放一些面粉，用手压平，再卷起来。

yingyinNormal.en: Soya beans are fermented with wheat flour then filtered and pasteurized for differing lengths of time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 酱油是由大豆和面粉一起发酵，之后经过时间或长或短的过滤和灭菌。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna show you how to use flour, yeast, salt, olive oil and water and turn it into something truly magical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我将教你怎样把面粉，酵母，盐橄榄油和水变成一种很神奇的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm using Justin's freshly ground flour, made with Howard's wheat, to bake a loaf in the mill's own bakery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要拿贾斯汀用霍华德的小麦磨出来的面粉 在磨坊的面包房里做一条面包。

yingyinNormal.en: We start with butter and sugar and flour, then we add an egg, and most important of all, the chocolate bits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一步要放黄油，糖，还有面粉，然后还有鸡蛋。最后最重要的是把巧克力放进去。

yingyinNormal.en: We start with butter and sugar and flour, then we add an egg, and most important of all, the chocolate bits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一步要放黄油，糖，还有面粉，然后还有鸡蛋。最后最重要的是把巧克力放进去。

yingyinNormal.en: To start with, 500 grams of strong white flour. So the next building block, 7 grams yeast. That goes to one side of the bowl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一开始，需要500克的高筋面粉，接下来发面 ，7克的酵母粉放在碗的一侧。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 繁荣；茂盛；挥舞…以引起注意；炫耀；兴旺；成功；迅速发展；处于事业鼎盛时期

word_family.mean: n. 谷物粉；面粉；淀粉质植物籽（或根）磨成的粉

examination_example.sentence: In the back room of the little bakery, his interest in design and his baking talent combined to work wonders—he shaped delicious masterpieces out of <highlight>flour</highlight>, butter and sugar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这家小面包店的后房，他对设计的兴趣和他的烘焙天赋共同创造了奇迹——他用面粉，黄油和糖制作出了美味的杰作。

examination_example.sentence: I wanted to make dumplings but found I had run out of <highlight>flour</highlight>, so I went out to buy some.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想包饺子，但发现面粉用完了，于是我去买了一些。

examination_example.sentence: I pay £5 for a portion (一份), but Matt makes them for 26p a portion, because they are <highlight>flour</highlight>, water, sugar and oil.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我付5英镑买一份，但马特做一份要卖26便士，因为它们是面粉、水、糖和油的混合物。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Layers（层）of white cloth are glued together with <highlight>flour</highlight> paste (糨糊).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几层白布用面糊粘在一起。

examination_example.sentence: We throw <highlight>flour</highlight> (面粉) at our friends!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们向我们的朋友扔面粉！

examination_example.sentence: He didn’t have enough <highlight>flour</highlight> to make more breads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他没有足够的面粉来做更多的面包。
